channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1404|2024-08-05T03:59:39.092Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager (RQM) 5.0 through 5.02 and 6.0 through 6.0.6 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138440.
